attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Daily Mail "Newspaper" has for years been publishing incredibly Ageist, and borderline Racist and Homophobic commenst in Britain, which have stirred up vast amongst of hatred and fear in the British public with manufactured scaremongering and overblown demonization of minority groups such as Teenagers and Asylum Seekers. Therefore we must rid the country of this insecurity by banning The Daily Mail from publication.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
